sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: FLP-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence TCTAGAAA (Turan and Bode, 2011).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: FRT
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:bound_moiety: FLP recombinase from the Saccharomyces cerevisiae 2u plasmid
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: FRT
tet operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: bacterial operator O2 for the tetR and tetA genes
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: tet operator

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: EXFP-R
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: EXFP-R
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: For distinguishing EGFP variants, reverse primer

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: HaloTag(R)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: modified bacterial dehalogenase that forms covalent bonds with chloroalkane derivatives
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: HaloTag(R)
pRS-marker
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: pRS vectors, use to sequence yeast selectable marker
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pRS-marker

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: first 17 amino acids of budding yeast Abp140
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: Lifeact

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac promoter

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: M13 rev

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AmpR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to ampicillin, carbenicillin, and related antibiotics
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AmpR

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: tet operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: bacterial operator O2 for the tetR and tetA genes
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: tet operator

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: M13 Reverse
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: In lacZ gene. Also called M13-rev

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: BGH-rev
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Bovine growth hormone terminator, reverse primer. Also called BGH reverse
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: BGH-rev
lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac operator
T2A
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: 2A peptide from Thosea asigna virus capsid protein
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Eukaryotic ribosomes fail to insert a peptide bond between the Gly and Pro residues, yielding separate polypeptides.
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: T2A
CMV-F
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Human CMV immediate early promoter, forward primer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: CMV-F

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: CAP binding site
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: CAP binding activates transcription in the presence of cAMP.
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: CAP binding site
